name: Jorge Orpinel
body:
Find me on [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/jorgeorpinel) and [AngelList](https://angel.co/jorgeorpinel).

### New Website and Portfolio
I am building a new website (see [old one](http://jorge.orpinel.com)) to showcase my professional experience and resume. In the future I will expand it to include other personal interests, such as my [blog](http://rehalcon.blogspot.com).

### Underlying technology
This version is an automatically generated GitHub Page. I plan to migrate to a custom, responsive HTML5 template (or 2).

-@jorgeorpinel
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
